channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Tyler's Blog

item.title: About Tyler Jewell
item.description: I have worked in technology since 1991 where I had a part time QA and operations job for Banner Blue Software in Fremont, California. My QA was click-and-pray, but that exposed a fascinating industry. I later earned a Computer Science degree at Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology. I specialize in technology to make developers’ lives better. My career began as an unimpressive software engineer and later found success in evangelism, product management, entrepreneurism, and investing.
